deg2rad = math.pi/180.0
#Enter the computations here m1=random.randrange(700,1000,50) m2=random.randrange(700,1000,50) theta=random.randrange(30,50,5) r= m2/ m1/math.tan( theta* deg2rad)
problem.p: Two cars are approaching a perpendicular intersection without a stop sign. Car 1 has a mass $m1 kg and is heading north and car 2 has mass $m2 kg and is heading west. The two cars collide at the intersection, and stick together as a result of the collision. The police report stated that after the collision, the two cars were moving in a direction \( $theta^o \) west of north. What is the ratio of the initial speed of car 1 to car 2?
